pages.title: Voltus Generator
pages.text: The <item>Voltus Generator/$ is a way of converting <item>$(l:essentials:alchemy/stones)Voltus/$ into FE. It accepts <item>$(l:essentials:alchemy/stones)voltus/$ through a <item>$(l:essentials:alchemy/conduit)conduit/$ connection on any side, and will auto-output FE on all sides.$(br2)It converts (by default) 1 <item>voltus/$ to 2,000FE at 2,000FE/t, and can store a buffer of 100 <item>voltus/$.$(br2)
A good way of transferring and storing the FE it makes is with an <item>$(l:essentials:alchemy/atmos_fe)Atmospheric Attenuator/$.$(br2)
